channel.title: Saradomin needs more for the team!
channel.description:
Saradomin just released its beta today and I'm ready for a swarm of bugs to be found.
I am looking for someone to specifically focus on fixing bugs players have found.
We are using a 317, PI.
We are also looking for someone to join the team as a web developer and an official graphics designer.
Post here in any unique format you wish or contact me: Skype:TheRuzylo chris@ruzylo.com (Best for initial contact) http://saradomin.com
Thank you all, Ruzylo.
